titles.title: Second Generation Biofuel Extension Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the second generation biofuel producer credit and the special allowance for second generation biofuel plant property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2013--Introduced. Second Generation Biofuel Extension Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2014: (1) the second generation biofuel producer tax credit, and (2) the depreciation allowance for second generation biofuel plant property.
